description: This file defines the 'Note' class used to represent note entities within the application, including properties, serialization/deserialization methods, and utility functions.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a single note with properties such as id, title, content, and timestamps, along with methods for creating instances from maps, converting to maps, copying, and utility overrides.

methods.name: Note.fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Note instance from a map, typically retrieved from database query results.

methods.name: Note.toMap
methods.description: Converts a Note instance to a map for database insertion or update.

methods.name: Note.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the note with optional overridden fields.
